example.text: Anti-hunger workers in Vermont do an incredible job feeding folks who need help. But they can't do that if crucial programs are gutted by a default or Republicans slash food benefits for those who need them most. [[url]]
Today, I joined [[user]] to advance bipartisan railway safety legislation. We need stronger safety guidelines to avoid disasters like the one in East Palestine from happening again.

Today, I introduced the HEAT Act to help farmers dealing with rising costs. Encouraging more industrial heat pumps means lower energy bills for farmers and lower carbon emissions for the planet. [[url]]
But can any of us look in a mirror and feel good about the use of that authority when the effect of that power as it is being used right now is just flat-out mean? It is mean to families.
There are many responsible gun owners in Vermont. They know they don’t need an AR-15 to protect their families or to hunt recreationally. It's time to ban assault weapons.
